channel.title: Variable Expected in script

item.title: Variable Expected in script
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

Very Weird. I do not know what is wrong as there should be no Variable because you have placed one in its’ correct position. It happened to me too.

I tried everything i could think of at this moment but nothng seemed to work.

item.title: Variable Expected in script
item.dc:creator: @scarscaper4life scarscaper4life
item.description:
@scarscaper4life wrote:

well i keep getting this error in my script and i have no idea how to fix it

Line 1: [Error] (1:1): Variable Expected in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\new flax picker!!!13372.scar

here is the script i know its a bit messy but hey

[code]program hello;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\Extended\Obsolete.Scar}

var

laddercolor,ladder3,tree2,blackblob,flax1,tree1,ladder2,ladder1,maple4,maple3,maple2,maple1,bank5,bank4,bank3,bank2,bank1 :Integer;
box: TBox;

procedure setupscript;

begin
setupsrl;
end;

procedure loadsbitmaps;

begin

bank1 := BitmapFromString(3, 13, ‘z78DA73747234347674C4205D’ +
‘8D5D4C4D2C90D9C8A4999B99858121329B18114C7390CD87A8214’ +
‘68478F7209300586A3490’);

bank2 := BitmapFromString(12, 5, ‘z78DA73B2743676727242221D’ +
‘9D1C0D8D1D5D8D5D4C4D2CCCDCCC2C0C0C91D996968EC6964EC8A’ +
‘4138609C498032171E9C53407D9346412D934FCEEC1651A2E3F12’ +
‘EF3662CC0100224453CB’);

bank3 := BitmapFromString(9, 3, ‘z78DA73B274367672727472343’ +
‘47644265D8D5D4C4D2CCCDCCC2C0C0C91D996968EC6964E4E48BA’ +
‘20B29824443D2E5DC8B2B8D4434800D58324D4’);

bank5 := BitmapFromString(3, 8, ‘z78DA7335763135B1704522CDD’ +
‘CCC2C0C0C91D9C488B86298E3E8E46868EC88AC861811001F2020’ +
‘3B’);

maple1 := BitmapFromString(9, 4, ‘z78DA33363236343032069326’ +
‘16C696066E66E626A686A6982444D618493DF1BA7091B874E1D74’ +
‘B8C2E00F2482D06’);

maple2 := BitmapFromString(3, 5, ‘z78DA33363236343032069386’ +
‘E6468E06E62616C696066EF8494C95101108696A68E4626000005’ +
‘C1A130B’);

maple3 := BitmapFromString(3, 5, ‘6745156745153231026745156’ +
‘7451548390F674515674515674515674515674515674515512D00’ +
‘512D00323102’);

maple4 := BitmapFromString(4, 3, ‘323102172A07674515674515’ +
‘48390F48390F67451567451548390F48390F674515674515’);

ladder1 := BitmapFromString(6, 1, ‘z78DA33353472313030C54B0’ +
‘20089460769’);

ladder2 := BitmapFromString(1, 4, ‘512D00512D00512D00512D00’ +
‘’);

tree1 := BitmapFromString(8, 7, ‘z78DA337633373172330693668’ +
‘6E64686CEC493C8BA8CF19A832C8B4B25A638946D6E626A688AA9’ +
‘D7D409875EB07A882CA67A64716411645D987A31D59B3B99181AA’ +
‘0A88790004E9249C0’);

flax1 := BitmapFromString(1, 1, ‘5C68A9’);

blackblob := BitmapFromString(4, 4, ‘z78DA3330A02D0000698D1’ +
‘201’);

tree2 := BitmapFromString(7, 4, ‘z78DA333534733372350593C69’ +
‘6266E06CE50D2184162CA228B98229B608C2E8249229B8C69A6B9’ +
‘A58981A109A67A0063B12579’);

ladder3 := BitmapFromString(4, 6, ‘z78DA333336B2303030C3413’ +
‘A1A5B5A589A23936644ABC7AF06930D210169091DB7’);

end;

procedure findthebank;

begin
wait(5000);
//if(FindDeformed(X, Y, bank1, 570, 5, 725, 160))or (FindDeformed(X, Y, bank2, 570, 5, 725, 160))or (FindDeformed(X, Y, bank3, 570, 5, 725, 160))or (FindDeformed(X, Y, bank4, 570, 5, 725, 160))or (FindDeformed(X, Y, bank5, 570, 5, 725, 160))then
if(FindDeformed(X, Y, maple1, 570, 5, 725, 160))or (FindDeformed(X, Y, maple4, 570, 5, 725, 160))or (FindDeformed(X, Y, maple2, 570, 5, 725, 160))or (FindDeformed(X, Y, maple3, 570, 5, 725, 160))then
mouse(x,y,5,5,true);
flag;

end;

procedure findthemapletree;

begin
wait(3000);
if(FindDeformed(X, Y, maple1, 570, 5, 725, 160))or (FindDeformed(X, Y, maple4, 570, 5, 725, 160))or (FindDeformed(X, Y, maple2, 570, 5, 725, 160))or (FindDeformed(X, Y, maple3, 570, 5, 725, 160))then
mouse(x,y+38,5,5,true);
flag;
end;

procedure totheflaxfield;

begin
wait(2000);
AngleWalk(312, 70, 4, 4);
flag;
end;

procedure findthemapletree2;

begin
wait(3000);
if(FindDeformed(X, Y, maple1, 570, 5, 725, 160))or (FindDeformed(X, Y, maple4, 570, 5, 725, 160))or (FindDeformed(X, Y, maple2, 570, 5, 725, 160))or (FindDeformed(X, Y, maple3, 570, 5, 725, 160))then
mouse(x,y+80,5,5,true);
flag;
end;

procedure findthetree;

begin
wait(3000);
//if(FindDeformed(X, Y, ladder3, 570, 5, 725, 160))then
laddercolor:=FindLadderColor;
if(laddercolor=0)then
findthetree;
//FindMiniColor(x, x , laddercolor, 10, true);
if(FindColorSkipBoxTolerance(x, y, laddercolor,654, 0, 721, 154, 5, box))and
FindMiniColor(x+2, y+2, 8816532, 250, true)then
//ScanMMAreaColorExactTolerance(x, y, 644, 1, 716, 155, laddercolor, 20);
mouse(x,y,5,5,true);
flag;
end;

procedure findtheflaxfield;

begin
wait(3000);
if(FindDeformed(X, Y, flax1, 570, 5, 725, 160))then
mouse(x,y,5,5,true);
flag;
end;

procedure tothebank;

begin
AngleWalk(50, 50, 4, 4);
flag;
end;

procedure tothebankpart2;

begin
wait(3000);
if(FindDeformed(X, Y, blackblob, 570, 5, 725, 160))then
mouse(x-40,y,5,5,true);
flag;
end;

begin
setupscript;
loadsbitmaps;
//totheflaxfield;
//findthemapletree;
//findthemapletree2;
findthetree;
//findtheflaxfield;
//tothebank;
//tothebankpart2;

end.[/code]

the weird thing is that libe 1 i just set the name.

if anyone can help i would be extremly greatful thanks
